title: admin_audit app crashes server
body:
owncloud 4.5.11 running on ubuntu 12.04 lts with mysql and php 5.3 

oc 4.5.11 sets up without issue, and am able to log in as the admin.  once i enable the admin audit app i receive the server error screen and can no longer access owncloud until going into the database and turning off the application.  here is what i was able to pull from the apache logs:

[fri may 31 09:58:54 2013] [notice] apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu) php/5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6 with suhosin-patch configured -- resuming normal operations
[fri may 31 12:09:13 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] file does not exist: /var/www/favicon.ico
[fri may 31 13:11:06 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] php fatal error:  class 'oc\\files\\filesystem' not found in /var/www/owncloud/apps/admin_audit/appinfo/app.php on line 7, referer: http://192.168.1.64/owncloud/settings/apps.php?installed
[fri may 31 13:11:09 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] php fatal error:  class 'oc\\files\\filesystem' not found in /var/www/owncloud/apps/admin_audit/appinfo/app.php on line 7, referer: http://192.168.1.64/owncloud/settings/apps.php?installed
[fri may 31 13:11:14 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] php fatal error:  class 'oc\\files\\filesystem' not found in /var/www/owncloud/apps/admin_audit/appinfo/app.php on line 7, referer: http://192.168.1.64/owncloud/
[fri may 31 13:11:16 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] php fatal error:  class 'oc\\files\\filesystem' not found in /var/www/owncloud/apps/admin_audit/appinfo/app.php on line 7, referer: http://192.168.1.64/owncloud/
[fri may 31 13:13:06 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] php fatal error:  class 'oc\\files\\filesystem' not found in /var/www/owncloud/apps/admin_audit/appinfo/app.php on line 7, referer: http://192.168.1.64/owncloud/
[fri may 31 13:13:06 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] file does not exist: /var/www/favicon.ico
[fri may 31 13:14:03 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] php fatal error:  class 'oc\\files\\filesystem' not found in /var/www/owncloud/apps/admin_audit/appinfo/app.php on line 7
[fri may 31 13:14:03 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] file does not exist: /var/www/favicon.ico
[fri may 31 13:15:37 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] php fatal error:  class 'oc\\files\\filesystem' not found in /var/www/owncloud/apps/admin_audit/appinfo/app.php on line 7
[fri may 31 13:15:37 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.40] file does not exist: /var/www/favicon.ico
[fri may 31 13:21:46 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.64] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/data/htaccesstest.txt
